name: chatbot-template
description: Boiler-plate for fb chatbot using node+express+vue

scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.push: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'App deployment' && git pull && git push origin master
scripts.deploy-heroku: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'App deployment' && git pull && git push heroku master

author: Ariel Balita
